page.title: 12Home Life 2.
page.content: For many children the school day is very similar to the one described on page 11,they all seemed to follow more or less the same routine so we decided to look at how children spent their time at the weekends when they had more spare time.Here is one example which was most common. On Saturdays and Sundays we are able to stay in bed a little longer.On Saturday I don't get up until eight thirty,I have to get up then because the family goes shopping in Andover.This usually takes most of the morning.We come home and have lunch,then if it's fine I go out with my friends and play.If it's wet then I usually stop in and watch television,or play in my room.On Sunday most of the family stays in bed much longer.
